attributes.action: Demand the removal of CCTV cameras in all school toilets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are asking for the removal of all CCTV cameras in school toilets. 

Across the United Kingdom there seems to be a systematic installation of CCTV cameras in school toilets, this decision has not been through a nation wide consultation with Parents and pupils.  It is just assumed that people will not be enraged by these callous decisions taken on our behalf and will happily go along with it, fortunately it is not so. 

We see it as gross invasion of privacy, which is getting out of hand....
